item.title: Why should you withhold giving parenteral iron when there is an active infection?
item.description: Would giving parenteral iron add any clinical benefits to the patients now? What is the expected onset of action on the haemoglobin and iron levels? doi:10.1001/jamanetworkopen.2021.33935 doi: 10.1016/j.bbagen.2008.07.002
